part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Enlargement, improvement or other alteration of a dwellinghouse
description: "The enlargement, improvement or other alteration of a dwellinghouse"

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Additions etc to the roof of a dwellinghouse
description: The enlargement of a dwellinghouse consisting of an addition or alteration to its roof

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Other alterations to the roof of a dwellinghouse
description: Any other alteration to the roof of a dwellinghouse

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Porches
description: The erection or construction of a porch outside any external door of a dwellinghouse

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Buildings etc incidental to the enjoyment of a dwellinghouse
description: The provision within the curtilage of the dwellinghouse of: (a) any building or enclosure, swimming or other pool required for a purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such, or the maintenance, improvement or other alteration of such a building or enclosure; (b) a container used for domestic heating purposes for the storage of oil or liquid petroleum gas.

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Hard surfaces incidental to the enjoyment of a dwellinghouse
description: Development consisting of: (a) the provision within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse of a hard surface for any purpose incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such; (b) the replacement in whole or in part of such a surface.

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Chimneys, flues etc on a dwellinghouse
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a chimney, flue or soil and vent pipe on a dwellinghouse

part-title: Development within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse
name: Microwave antenna on a dwellinghouse
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a microwave antenna on a dwellinghouse or within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse

name: Gates, fences, walls etc
description: The erection, construction, maintenance, improvement or alteration of a gate, fence, wall or other means of enclosure

name: Means of access to a highway
description: The formation, laying out and construction of a means of access to a highway which is not a trunk road or a classified road, where that access is required in connection with development permitted by any Class in this Schedule (other than by Class A of this Part).

name: Exterior painting
description: The painting of the exterior of any building or work

name: Electrical outlet for recharging vehicles
description: The installation, alteration or replacement, within an area lawfully used for off-street parking, of an electrical outlet mounted on a wall for recharging electric vehicles

name: Electrical upstand for recharging vehicles
description: The installation, alteration or replacement, within an area lawfully used for off-street parking, of an upstand with an electrical outlet mounted on it for recharging electric vehicles

name: Closed circuit television cameras
description: The installation, alteration or replacement on a building of a closed circuit television camera to be used for security purposes

name: Restaurants, cafes, takeaways or pubs to retail
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building from a use falling within Class A3 (restaurants and cafes), A4 (drinking establishments) or A5 (hot food takeaways) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, to a use falling within Class A1 (shops) or Class A2 (financial and professional services) of that Schedule.

name: Takeaways or pubs to restaurants and cafes
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building from a use falling within Class A4 (drinking establishments) or Class A5 (hot food takeaways) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, to a use falling within Class A3 (restaurants and cafes) of that Schedule.

name: Retail, betting office or pay day loan shop or casino to restaurant or cafe
description: Development consisting of: (a) a change of use of a building from a use, (i) falling within Class A1 (shops) or Class A2 (financial and professional services) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, (ii) as a betting office or pay day loan shop, or (iii) as a casino,to a use falling within Class A3 (restaurants and cafes) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order; (b) building or other operations for the provision of facilities for (i) ventilation and extraction (including the provision of an external flue), and (ii) the storage of rubbish,reasonably necessary to use the building for a use falling within Class A3 (restaurants and cafes) of that Schedule.

name: Shops to financial and professional
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building within its curtilage from a use falling within Class A1 (shops) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, to use falling within Class A2 (financial and professional services) of that Schedule

name: Financial and professional or betting office or pay day loan shop to shops
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building with a display window at ground floor level from: (a) a use falling within Class A2 (financial and professional services) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, or (b)a use as a betting office or a pay day loan shop, to a use falling within Class A1 (shops) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order.

name: Betting offices or pay day loan shops to financial and professional
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building from a use as a betting office or a pay day loan shop to a use falling within Class A2 (financial and professional services) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order

name: Retail or betting office or pay day loan shop to mixed use
Mixed use to retail
Industrial and general business conversions
Retail or betting office or pay day loan shop to assembly and leisure
description:
Development consisting of a change of use of a building from a use:
(a) falling within Class A1 (shops) or Class A2 (financial and professional services) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, or
(b) as a betting office or pay day loan shop, to a use falling within Class D2 (assembly and leisure) of that Schedule.

name: Casinos to assembly and leisure
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building from a use as a casino to a use falling within Class D2 (assembly and leisure) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order.

name: Small HMOs to dwellinghouses and vice versa
Retail or betting office or pay day loan shop to dwellinghouses
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) a change of use of a building from—
(i) a use falling within Class A1 (shops) or Class A2 (financial and professional services) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order;
(ii) a use as a betting office or pay day loan shop, or
(iii) a mixed use combining use as a dwellinghouse with—
(aa) a use as a betting office or pay day loan shop, or
(bb) a use falling within either Class A1 (shops) or Class A2 (financial and professional services) of that Schedule (whether that use was granted permission under Class G of this Part or otherwise),to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of that Schedule, and
(b) building operations reasonably necessary to convert the building referred to in paragraph (a) to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of that Schedule.

name: Specified sui generis uses to dwellinghouses
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use as—
(i) an amusement arcade or centre, or
(ii) a casino,to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order; and
(b) building operations reasonably necessary to convert the building referred to in paragraph (a) to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of that Schedule.

name: Offices to dwellinghouses
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use falling within Class B1(a) (offices) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of that Schedule.

name: Storage or distribution centre to dwellinghouses
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use falling within Class B8 (storage or distribution centre) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of that Schedule

name: Agricultural buildings to dwellinghouses
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use as an agricultural building to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order; and
(b) building operations reasonably necessary to convert the building referred to in paragraph (a) to a use falling within Class C3 (dwellinghouses) of that Schedule

name: Agricultural buildings to a flexible commercial use
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use as an agricultural building to a flexible use falling within Class A1 (shops), Class A2 (financial and professional services), Class A3 (restaurants and cafes), Class B1 (business), Class B8 (storage or distribution), Class C1 (hotels) or Class D2 (assembly and leisure) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order.

name: Agricultural buildings to state-funded school or registered nursery
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use as an agricultural building to use as a state-funded school or a registered nursery

name: Business, hotels etc to state-funded schools or registered nursery
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage from a use falling within Class B1 (business), Class C1 (hotels), Class C2 (residential institutions), Class C2A (secure residential institutions) or Class D2 (assembly and leisure) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, to use as a state-funded school or a registered nursery.

name: Return to previous use from converted state-funded school or registered nursery
description: Development consisting of a change of use of land from a use permitted by Class T to the previous lawful use of the land

name: Changes of use permitted under a permission granted on an application
description: Development consisting of a change of use of a building or other land from a use permitted by planning permission granted on an application, to another use which that permission would have specifically authorised when it was granted.

name: Temporary buildings and structures
description: The provision on land of buildings, moveable structures, works, plant or machinery required temporarily in connection with and for the duration of operations being or to be carried out on, in, under or over that land or on land adjoining that land

name: Temporary use of land
description:
The use of any land for any purpose for not more than 28 days in total in any calendar year, of which not more than 14 days in total may be for the purposes of:
(a) the holding of a market;
(b) motor car and motorcycle racing including trials of speed, and practising for these activities,
and the provision on the land of any moveable structure for the purposes of the permitted use.

name: Use as a state-funded school for a single academic year
description: The use of a building and any land within its curtilage as a state-funded school for a single academic year

name: Shops, financial, cafes, takeaways, pubs etc to temporary flexible use
description:
Development consisting of a change of use of a building and any land within its curtilage:
(a) from —
(i) a use falling within Class A1 (shops), Class A2 (financial and professional services), Class A3 (restaurants and cafes), Class A4 (drinking establishments), Class A5 (hot food takeaways), Class B1 (business), Class D1 (non-residential institutions) and Class D2 (assembly and leisure) of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order, or
(ii) a use as a betting office or pay day loan shop,
(b) to a flexible use falling within Class A1 (shops), Class A2 (financial and professional services), Class A3 (restaurants and cafes) or Class B1 (business) of that Schedule, for a single continuous period of up to 2 years beginning on the date the building and any land within its curtilage begins to be used for the flexible use or on the date given in the notice under paragraph D.2(a), whichever is the earlier.

name: Temporary use of buildings or land for film-making purposes
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) the temporary use of any land or buildings for a period not exceeding 9 months in any 27 month period for the purpose of commercial film-making; and
(b) the provision on such land, during the filming period, of any temporary structures, works, plant or machinery required in connection with that use.

name: Use of land as caravan site
description: The use of land, other than a building, as a caravan site in the circumstances referred to in paragraph A.2.

name: Development on caravan site required by conditions
description: Development required by the conditions of a site licence for the time being in force under the 1960 Act.

name: Use of land by members of certain recreational organisations
description: The use of land by members of a recreational organisation for the purposes of recreation or instruction, and the erection or placing of tents on the land for the purposes of the use

name: Agricultural development on units of 5 hectares or more
description:
The carrying out on agricultural land comprised in an agricultural unit of 5 hectares or more in area of:
(a) works for the erection, extension or alteration of a building; or
(b) any excavation or engineering operations, which are reasonably necessary for the purposes of agriculture within that unit.

name: Agricultural development on units of less than 5 hectares
Mineral working for agricultural purposes
description: The winning and working on land held or occupied with land used for the purposes of agriculture of any minerals reasonably necessary for agricultural purposes within the agricultural unit of which it forms part

name: Forestry developments
Extensions etc of shops or financial or professional premises
description: The extension or alteration of a shop or financial or professional services establishment

name: Construction of shop trolley stores
description: The erection or construction of a trolley store within the curtilage of a shop

name: Click and collect facilities
description: Development consisting of the erection or construction of a collection facility within the curtilage of a shop

name: Modification of shop loading bays
description: Development consisting of modification of a loading bay of a shop

name: Hard surfaces for shops, catering or financial or professional premises
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) the provision of a hard surface within the curtilage of a shop or catering, financial or professional services establishment; or
(b) the replacement in whole or in part of such a surface

name: Extensions etc of office buildings
description: The extension or alteration of an office building

name: Hard surfaces for office buildings
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) the provision of a hard surface within the curtilage of an office building to be used for the purpose of the office concerned; or
(b) the replacement in whole or in part of such a surface

name: Extensions etc of industrial and warehouse
description: The erection, extension or alteration of an industrial building or a warehouse

name: Developments relating to an industrial process
description:
Development carried out on industrial land for the purposes of an industrial process consisting of:
(a) the installation of additional or replacement plant or machinery;
(b) the provision, rearrangement or replacement of a sewer, main, pipe, cable or other apparatus, or
(c) the provision, rearrangement or replacement of a private way, private railway, siding or conveyor

name: Hard surfaces for industrial and warehouse premises
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) the provision of a hard surface within the curtilage of an industrial building or warehouse to be used for the purpose of the undertaking concerned; or
(b) the replacement in whole or in part of such a surface

name: Waste deposits from an industrial process
description: The deposit of waste material resulting from an industrial process on any land comprised in a site which was used for that purpose on 1st July 1948 whether or not the superficial area or the height of the deposit is extended as a result

name: Development at waste management facilities
description:
Development carried out on land used for the purposes of a waste management facility consisting of:
(a) the extension or alteration of a building; and
(b) the installation of replacement plant or machinery

name: Extensions etc for schools, colleges, universities and hospitals
description: The erection, extension or alteration of a school, college, university or hospital building

name: Hard surfaces for schools, colleges, universities or hospitals
description:
Development consisting of:
(a) the provision of a hard surface within the curtilage of any school, college, university or hospital to be used for the purposes of that school, college, university or hospital; or
(b) the replacement in whole or in part of such a surface

name: Railway or light railway undertakings
description: Development by railway undertakers on their operational land, required in connection with the movement of traffic by rail

name: Dock, pier, harbour, water transport, canal or inland navigation undertakings
description:
Development on operational land by statutory undertakers or their lessees in respect of dock, pier, harbour, water transport, or canal or inland navigation undertakings, required:
(a) for the purposes of shipping, or
(b) in connection with the embarking, disembarking, loading, discharging or transport of passengers, livestock or goods at a dock, pier or harbour, or with the movement of traffic by canal or inland navigation or by any railway forming part of the undertaking

name: Works to inland waterways
description: The improvement, maintenance or repair of an inland waterway (other than a commercial waterway or cruising waterway) to which section 104 of the Transport Act 1968 (classification of waterways)(30) applies, and the repair or maintenance of a culvert, weir, lock, aqueduct, sluice, reservoir, let-off valve or other work used in connection with the control and operation of such a waterway

name: Dredging by transport undertakings
description: The use of any land by statutory undertakers in respect of dock, pier, harbour, water transport, canal or inland navigation undertakings for the spreading of any dredged material

name: Development for the aid of shipping
description: Development required for the purposes of the functions of a general or local lighthouse authority under the Merchant Shipping Act 1995(31) and any other statutory provision made with respect to a local lighthouse authority, or in the exercise by a local lighthouse authority of rights, powers or duties acquired by usage prior to the 1995 Act

name: Development at an airport
description: The carrying out on operational land by a relevant airport operator or its agent of development (including the erection or alteration of an operational building) in connection with the provision of services and facilities at a relevant airport

name: Air traffic services development at an airport
description: The carrying out on operational land within the perimeter of a relevant airport by a relevant airport operator or its agent of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

name: Air traffic services development near an airport
description: The carrying out on operational land outside but within 8 kilometres of the perimeter of a relevant airport by a relevant airport operator or its agent of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

name: Development by an air traffic services licence holder within an airport
description: The carrying out by an air traffic services licence holder or its agents within the perimeter of an airport of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

name: Development by an air traffic services licence holder on operational land
description: The carrying out on operational land of an air traffic services licence holder by that licence holder or its agents of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

name: Development by an air traffic services licence holder in an emergency
description: The use of land by or on behalf of an air traffic services licence holder in an emergency to station moveable apparatus replacing unserviceable apparatus

name: Development by an air traffic services licence holder involving moveable structures
description: he use of land by or on behalf of an air traffic services licence holder to provide services and facilities in connection with the provision of air traffic services and the erection or placing of moveable structures on the land for the purposes of that use

name: Development by the Civil Aviation Authority for surveys etc
description: The use of land by or on behalf of the Civil Aviation Authority for the stationing and operation of apparatus in connection with the carrying out of surveys or investigations

name: Use of airport buildings managed by relevant airport operators
description: The use of buildings within the perimeter of an airport managed by a relevant airport operator for purposes connected with air transport services or other flying activities at that airport

name: Development by highways authorities
description:
The carrying out by a highway authority:
(a) on land within the boundaries of a road, of any works required for the maintenance or improvement of the road, where such works involve development by virtue of section 55(2)(b)(38) of the Act; or
(b) on land outside but adjoining the boundary of an existing highway of works required for or incidental to the maintenance or improvement of the highway.

name: Development by the Secretary of State or a strategic highways company under the Highways Act 1980
description: The carrying out by the Secretary of State or a strategic highways company of works in exercise of the functions of the Secretary of State or the company under the Highways Act 1980(39), or works in connection with, or incidental to, the exercise of those functions

name: Tramway or road transport undertakings
Toll road facilities
Repairs to unadopted streets and private ways
description: The carrying out on land within the boundaries of an unadopted street or private way of works required for the maintenance or improvement of the street or way

name: Repairs to services
description: The carrying out of any works for the purposes of inspecting, repairing or renewing any sewer, main, pipe, cable or other apparatus, including breaking open any land for that purpose

name: Development by Historic England
Demolition of buildings
description: Any building operation consisting of the demolition of a building

name: Demolition of gates, fences, walls etc
description: Any building operation consisting of the demolition of the whole or any part of any gate, fence, wall or other means of enclosure

name: Erection or construction and the maintenance, improvement or other alteration by a local authority or by an urban development corporation
Deposit of waste material
description: The deposit by a local authority of waste material on any land comprised in a site which was used for that purpose on 1st July 1948 whether or not the superficial area or the height of the deposit is extended as a result

name: Water or hydraulic power undertakings
Development by or on behalf of sewerage undertakers
Development by drainage bodies
description: Development by a drainage body in, on or under any watercourse or land drainage works required in connection with the improvement, maintenance or repair of that watercourse or those works

name: Development by the Environment Agency
Installation or alteration etc of solar equipment on domestic premises
description:
The installation, alteration or replacement of microgeneration solar PV or solar thermal equipment on:
(a) a dwellinghouse or a block of flats; or
(b) a building situated within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of stand-alone solar equipment on domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of stand-alone solar for microgeneration within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats.

name: Installation or alteration etc of ground source heat pumps on domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a microgeneration ground source heat pump within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats.

name: Installation or alteration etc of water source heat pumps on domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a microgeneration water source heat pump within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats.

name: Installation or alteration etc of flue for biomass heating system on domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a flue, forming part of a microgeneration biomass heating system, on a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of flue for combined heat and power on domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a flue, forming part of a microgeneration combined heat and power system, on a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of air source heat pumps on domestic premises
description:
The installation, alteration or replacement of a microgeneration air source heat pump:
(a) on a dwellinghouse or a block of flats; or
(b) within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats, including on a building within that curtilage

name: Installation or alteration etc of wind turbine on domestic premises
description:
The installation, alteration or replacement of a microgeneration wind turbine on:
(a) a detached dwellinghouse; or
(b) a detached building situated within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of stand-alone wind turbine on domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a stand-alone wind turbine for microgeneration within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of solar equipment on non-domestic premises
description:
The installation, alteration or replacement of:
(a) microgeneration solar thermal equipment on a building;
(b) microgeneration solar PV equipment on a building; or
(c) other solar PV equipment on the roof of a building, other than a dwellinghouse or a block of flats.

name: Installation or alteration etc of stand-alone solar equipment on non-domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of stand-alone solar for microgeneration within the curtilage of a building other than a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of ground source heat pump on non-domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a microgeneration ground source heat pump within the curtilage of a building other than a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Installation or alteration etc of water source heat pump on non-domestic premises
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of a microgeneration water source heat pump within the curtilage of a building other than a dwellinghouse or a block of flat

name: Installation etc of flue for biomass heating system on non-domestic premises
description:
The installation, alteration or replacement of a flue, forming part of a microgeneration biomass heating system, on a building other than:
(a) a dwellinghouse or a block of flats; or
(b) a building situated within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats.

name: Installation etc of flue for combined heat and power on non-domestic premises
description:
The installation, alteration or replacement of a flue, forming part of a microgeneration combined heat and power system, on a building other than:
(a) a dwellinghouse or a block of flats; or
(b) a building situated within the curtilage of a dwellinghouse or a block of flats

name: Gas transporters
Electricity undertakings
Electronic communications code operators
description:
Development by or on behalf of an electronic communications code operator for the purpose of the operator’s electronic communications network in, on, over or under land controlled by that operator or in accordance with the electronic communications code, consisting of:
(a) the installation, alteration or replacement of any electronic communications apparatus,
(b) the use of land in an emergency for a period not exceeding 6 months to station and operate moveable electronic communications apparatus required for the replacement of unserviceable electronic communications apparatus, including the provision of moveable structures on the land for the purposes of that use, or
(c) development ancillary to radio equipment housing.

name: Other telecommunications development
description: The installation, alteration or replacement on any building or other structure of a height of 15 metres or more of a microwave antenna and any structure intended for the support of a microwave antenna

name: Other telecommunications development: microwave antenna
description: The installation, alteration or replacement on any building or other structure of a height of less than 15 metres of a microwave antenna.

name: Driver information systems
description: The installation, alteration or replacement of system apparatus by or on behalf of a driver information system operator.

name: Universal postal service providers
description:
Development required for the purposes of a universal service provider (within the meaning of Part 3 of the Postal Services Act 2011(78)) in connection with the provision of a universal postal service (within the meaning of that Part) consisting of:
(a) the installation of posting boxes or self-service machines,
(b) any other development carried out in, on, over or under the operational land of the undertaking

name: Extensions, alterations etc ancillary to mining operations
description:
The carrying out of operations for the erection, extension, installation, rearrangement, replacement, repair or other alteration of any:
(a) plant or machinery,
(b) buildings,
(c) private ways or private railways or sidings, or
(d) sewers, mains, pipes, cables or other similar apparatus, on land used as a mine

name: Other developments ancillary to mining operations
description:
The carrying out, on land used as a mine or on ancillary mining land of operations for the erection, installation, extension, rearrangement, replacement, repair or other alteration of any:
(a) plant or machinery,
(b) buildings, or
(c) structures or erections

name: Developments for maintenance or safety
description: The carrying out of development required for the maintenance or safety of a mine or a disused mine or for the purposes of ensuring the safety of the surface of the land at or adjacent to a mine or a disused mine

name: Coal mining development by the Coal Authority and licensed operators
description:
Development by a licensee of the Coal Authority, in a mine started before 1st July 1948, consisting of:
(a) the winning and working underground of coal or coal-related minerals in a designated seam area; or
(b) the carrying out of development underground which is required in order to gain access to and work coal or coal-related minerals in a designated seam area

name: Coal mining development by a licensee of the British Coal Corporation
description:
Development by a licensee of the British Coal Corporation, in a mine started before 1st July 1948, consisting of:
(a) the winning and working underground of coal or coal-related minerals in a designated seam area; or
(b) the carrying out of development underground which is required in order to gain access to and work coal or coal-related minerals in a designated seam area

name: Coal-mining development on an authorised site
description: Any development required for the purposes of a mine which is carried out on an authorised site at that mine by a licensed operator in connection with coal-mining operations

name: Coal-mining development by the Coal Authority etc for maintenance or safety
description: The carrying out by the Coal Authority or a licensed operator of development required for the maintenance or safety of a mine or a disused mine or for the purposes of ensuring the safety of the surface of the land at or adjacent to a mine or a disused mine

name: Waste tipping at a mine
description: The deposit, on premises used as a mine or on ancillary mining land already used for the purpose, of waste derived from the winning and working of minerals at that mine or from minerals brought to the surface at that mine, or from the treatment or the preparation for sale, consumption or utilization of minerals from the mine

name: Waste tipping from a mine on sites used since 1948
description: The deposit on land comprised in a site used for the deposit of waste materials or refuse on 1st July 1948 of waste resulting from coal-mining operations

name: Temporary use of land etc for mineral exploration
description:
Development on any land during a period not exceeding 28 consecutive days consisting of:
(a) the drilling of boreholes;
(b) the carrying out of seismic surveys; or
(c) the making of other excavations, for the purpose of mineral exploration, and the provision or assembly on that land or adjoining land of any structure required in connection with any of those operations

name: Use of land etc for mineral exploration
description:
Development on any land consisting of:
(a) the drilling of boreholes;
(b) the carrying out of seismic surveys; or
(c) the making of other excavations, for the purposes of mineral exploration, and the provision or assembly on that land or on adjoining land of any structure required in connection with any of those operations

name: Removal of material from a stockpile
description: The removal of material of any description from a stockpile

name: Removal of material from mineral-working deposits
description: The removal of material of any description from a mineral-working deposit other than a stockpile

name: Development under local or private Acts or Order
description:
Development authorised by:
(a) a local or private Act of Parliament,
(b) an order approved by both Houses of Parliament, or
(c) an order under section 14 or 16 of the Harbours Act 1964 (orders for securing harbour efficiency etc, and orders conferring powers for improvement, construction etc of harbours)(97), which designates specifically the nature of the development authorised and the land upon which it may be carried out

name: Development at amusement parks
description:
Development on land used as an amusement park consisting of:
(a) the erection of booths or stalls or the installation of plant or machinery to be used for or in connection with the entertainment of the public within the amusement park; or
(b) the extension, alteration or replacement of any existing booths or stalls, plant or machinery so used

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: General development by the Crown

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Extension or alteration of an operational Crown building
description: The extension or alteration by or on behalf of the Crown of an operational Crown building

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Developments on operational Crown land
description:
Development carried out by or on behalf of the Crown on operational Crown land for operational purposes consisting of:
(a) the installation of additional or replacement plant or machinery;
(b) the provision, rearrangement or replacement of a sewer, main, pipe, cable or other apparatus; or
(c) the provision, rearrangement or replacement of a private way, private railway, siding or conveyor

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Hard surfaces for operational Crown buildings
description: The provision by or on behalf of the Crown of a hard surface within the curtilage of an operational Crown building

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development on operational Crown land relating to an airbase
description: The carrying out on operational Crown land, by or on behalf of the Crown, of development (including the erection or alteration of an operational building) in connection with the provision of services and facilities at an airbase

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development on operational land within an airbase
description: The carrying out on operational land within the perimeter of an airbase, by or on behalf of the Crown, of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development on operational land outside an airbase
description: The carrying out on operational land outside but within 8 kilometres of the perimeter of an airbase, by or on behalf of the Crown, of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development on operational land by the Crown connected with air traffic services
description: The carrying out on operational land, by or on behalf of the Crown, of development in connection with the provision of air traffic services

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Emergency use of land by the Crown connected with air traffic services
description: The use of land by or on behalf of the Crown in an emergency to station moveable apparatus replacing unserviceable apparatus in connection with the provision of air traffic services

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Use of land etc by the Crown connected with air traffic services
description: The use of land by or on behalf of the Crown to provide services and facilities in connection with the provision of air traffic services and the erection or placing of moveable structures on the land for the purposes of that use

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Use of land by the Crown in relation to surveys etc
description: The use of land by or on behalf of the Crown for the stationing and operation of apparatus in connection with the carrying out of surveys or investigations

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Use of buildings by the Crown on an airbase connected to air transport services etc
description: The use of buildings by or on behalf of the Crown within the perimeter of an airbase for purposes connected with air transport services or other flying activities at that airbase

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development by the Crown on operational Crown land connected to rail
description: Development by or on behalf of the Crown on operational Crown land, required in connection with the movement of traffic by rail

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development by the Crown on operational Crown land connected to shipping etc
description:
Development by or on behalf of the Crown or its lessees on operational Crown land where the development is required:
(a) for the purposes of shipping; or
(b) at a dock, pier, pontoon or harbour in connection with the embarking, disembarking, loading, discharging or transport of military or civilian personnel, military equipment, munitions, or other items.

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Use of land by the Crown for spreading of dredged material
description: The use of any land by or on behalf of the Crown for the spreading of any dredged material resulting from a dock, pier, harbour, water transport, canal or inland navigation undertaking

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development by the Crown on operational Crown land etc relating to aids to shipping
description:
Development by or on behalf of the Crown on operational Crown land, or for operational purposes, consisting of:
(a) the use of the land as a lighthouse, with all requisite works, roads and appurtenances;
(b) the extension of, alteration, or removal of a lighthouse; or
(c) the erection, placing, alteration or removal of a buoy or beacon.

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Development by the Crown relating to an emergency
description:
Development by or on behalf of the Crown on Crown land for the purposes of:
(a) preventing an emergency;
(b) reducing, controlling or mitigating the effects of an emergency; or
(c) taking other action in connection with an emergenc

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Erection etc of gates, fences etc by the Crown for national security purposes
description: The erection, construction, maintenance, improvement or alteration of a gate, fence, wall or other means of enclosure by or on behalf of the Crown on Crown land for national security purposes

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Closed circuit television cameras for national security purposes
description: The installation, alteration or replacement by or on behalf of the Crown on Crown land of a closed circuit television camera and associated lighting for national security purposes

part-title: Development by the Crown or for national security purposes
name: Electronic communication apparatus etc for national security purpose
description:
Development by or on behalf of the Crown for national security purposes in, on, over or under Crown land, consisting of:
(a) the installation, alteration or replacement of any electronic communications apparatus;
(b) the use of land in an emergency for a period not exceeding 6 months to station and operate moveable electronic communications apparatus required for the replacement of unserviceable electronic communications apparatus, including the provision of moveable structures on the land for the purposes of that use; or
(c) development ancillary to radio equipment housing
